Headline: #15 Jeffery Local & #28 Stony Island Temporary Reroute at 63rd/Stony Island

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#15 Jeffery Local & #28 Stony Island buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Stony Island, Lake Shore Drive, 57th & Stony Island, due to street blockage near 63rd/Stony Island.

Allow extra travel time.
